com.guitarshop

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guitarshop.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an inventory containing in-stock and sold guitars
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zorawar Moolenaar

    • Method Detail

      • addToCollection

        public void addToCollection(Guitar g)
        Creates guitar from given parameters and hands off adding to stock to its polymorphic counterpart
        Parameters:
        g - a Guitar

      • sell

        public boolean sell(int serialNo)
        Removes from stock and marks it as sold (adds to sales)
        Parameters:
        serialNo - serial number of guitar to delete
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed from stock and added to sales map; false otherwise

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Guitar> search(java.util.Collection<Guitar> coll,
                                          java.lang.String property)
        Searches for a guitar based on a single keyword

        Keyword can be any attribute of the guitar except the price.

        Parameters:
        coll - Collection to search from
        property - Property to search by
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing [1,N] guitars, or null

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Guitar> search(java.lang.String s)
        Searches for a guitar based on a single keyword
        Parameters:
        s - Property to search by
        Returns:
        Guitar complete object if found, or null

      • replace

        public void replace(int serialNo,
                    java.lang.String field,
                    java.lang.String value)
             throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        replace a given guitar field, view a specified value
        Parameters:
        serialNo - serial no of guitar to change
        field - field of guitar to change; MUST BE Title Case
        value - value of field to set
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if invalid serial number is injected
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid field or value is injected

      • getStockContents

        public java.util.Collection<Guitar> getStockContents()
        Returns a Collection of guitars in stock
        Returns:
        Collection of Guitars in stock

      • stockNotEmpty

        public boolean stockNotEmpty()
        Checks whether there are any guitars in stock
        Returns:
        true if stock has guitars

      • getFromStock

        public Guitar getFromStock(int serialNo)
        Returns a Guitar with given serial number from stock
        Parameters:
        serialNo - serial number of guitar to get from stock
        Returns:
        Guitar if found
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if guitar is not in stock

      • getSalesContents

        Collection of Guitars sold

        Parameters:
